posts.post_content:
Piedmont 150 back. Scans pretty much tell the story. Card is miscut top to bottom but guaranteed to receive a number if you go the professional grading route. If it doesn't, feel free to return it for a full refund.

$195. Payment can be made by check or money order (If I recognize you from the board, I'll ship the day after we reach a deal to make up for the no-PayPal delay.). Shipping will be $3.

E-mails to reserve the card take precedent over posts and PMs. Feel free to pass along any questions.

Thanks, Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com
